channel.title: New server. free items/staff
channel.description: want to be a part of the biggest and best new rsps in the making? if so add me on skype! (xxalexxxx88) and i will keep you updated on the server progress. the server will be done sometime this coming week some items will be given out as well as staff positions (to the most helpful) upon release of the server. pm me on skype if you're interested in being a part of my new community!

item.title: New server. free items/staff
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Sorry, this isn’t actually a server advertisement since you provide no link to play - only your Skype with an offer to play in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: New server. free items/staff
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Broken-Reality, post:4, topic:464193”][quote author=xxalexxxx link=topic=568043.msg4125044#msg4125044 date=1350268490]
9, actually. not out yet, actually. you mad bro, actually.
[/quote]
you just admitted you’re 9 years old, 9 year olds shouldn’t be making servers, you should be playing them, scene as, people who are 9 do NOT have a brain wait a couple of years, when you have some knowledge.[/quote]If he actually is 9 (which I kind of doubt), but if he is, I actually say good job to him for getting this far… Most 9 year olds are still playing the DS’s, this kids already starting to get this shit under his belt… The earlier you learn, the better IMO. Even if he doesn’t make it anywhere (which I doubt he will, because someone this young probably doesn’t know much about getting his name out there), he still gets the learning experience… But if he’s like 13+, then yea, nothing special here.

Read full topic
